bug.author: leonoverweel
bug.description: Hi, thanks for making UDT! I was wondering if there's a reason why there are no macOS .dmg installers for releases past v0.13.2? I installed that version and it prompts me to get v0.14.0, but there's no .dmg asset on that release.

comments.comment: Most likely a problem with our build server, thanks for bringing it up! We plan on supporting MacOS into the future, the 0.14 release was just pretty big so a lot of small things broke, probably including the MacOS build!

It seems v0.14.0 was just a fluke. v0.14.1 the mac dmg appears to be there! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1910070/97040027-619f0f80-153b-11eb-992e-f188328d879a.png></denchmark-link>
Thanks! I'll close this issue then :)
